summary: TAKATA RECALL.  WE RECEIVED LETTER JULY, 2016 WITH SAFETY RECALL NOTICE 16S26/NHTSA RECALL 16V-384. THE PASSENGER FRONTAL AIRBAG INFLATOR MAY RUPTURE. IT SAID WE WILL BE NOTIFIED WHEN PART IS IN.  WE HAVE'NT HEARD ANYTHING.  JUST CHECKED ON LINE AND SEEMS LIKE STILL NOT IN.  THIS IS RIDICULOUS.  WE HAVE BEEN DRIVING THIS CAR FOR ALMOST A YEAR WITH THIS RECALL.  WHAT ARE YOU GOING TO DO ABOUT THIS? WE ARE READY TO CONTACT LAWYER SINCE NOTHING IS BEING DONE.
